璲字的基本解释

璲
suì
古代贵族佩带的一种端玉。

璲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suì］
［《廣韻》徐醉切，去至，邪。］
(1)瑞玉。
(2)古代的一种玉制剑饰。
(3)同“繸”。贯串佩玉的丝绦。

璲字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璲； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页743第20
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徐醉切，音遂。【玉篇】玉璲，以玉爲佩也。【廣韻】玉也。【爾雅·釋器】璲，瑞也。【疏】璲者，瑞玉名也。【詩·小雅】鞙鞙佩璲。【傳】璲，瑞也。【後漢·輿服志】於是解去紱佩，留其係璲。　又【韻會】通作遂。【詩·衞風】容兮遂兮。【傳】佩玉遂遂然。【箋】瑞也。

璲字的源字形

璲字的起名意思

古代贵族佩带的一种端玉。

璲
Basic explanation of words
璲
suì
A kind of side jade worn by ancient nobles.
璲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suì］
["Guang Yun" Xu Zui cut, go to the end, evil. ]
(1) Ruiyu.
(2) An ancient jade sword ornament.
(3) Same as "繸". The silk ribbon running through the jade.
璲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璲; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 743 No. 20
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Xu Zui cut, and the sound succeeded. 【Jade articles】Jade charms, with jade as the adornment. [Guang Yun] Yu Ye. 【Erya·Shiqi】Chan, Rui Ye. 【Sparse】The name of Ruiyu is also the name of the 璲. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Fangyang Peihua. 【Biography】Chan, Rui Ye. [Later Han·Yufuzhi] So the stonework was removed, and it was kept as a charm.　[Rhyme Club] It's all done. 【Poetry·Weifeng】Rong Xi Xi Xi. [Biography] Peiyu then came. [J] Rui Ye.
